titlestmt.subtitle: Finding Aid
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Elisha Winkler.

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded in NoteTab Pro. Encoded by Deborah A. Richards. 2006-03-30

did.head: Collection Overview

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Smith College. Dept. of American Studies.

did.abstract: This collection is in five folders and contains course syllabi, announcements, invitations, newsletters, pamphlets, newspaper articles, exam questions, a handbook, and student assignments.

bioghist.p: American Studies was first introduced at Smith College as an interdepartmental major with the 1970-1971 academic year. Prior to this, courses were offered in various departments on campus, including English and History.

scopecontent.p: The American Studies Department records contain materials describing the classes, events, and offerings of the department. Types of materials include course syllabi, announcements, invitations, newsletters, pamphlets, newspaper articles, exam questions, a handbook, and student assignments about their ephemera collections.

userestrict.p: Single photocopies may be made for research purposes. Permission to publish material from the documents must be requested from the Smith College Archives. Smith College owns copyright to any published material relating to college events and activities. Provenance and copyright ownership of other materials is unknown and researchers are responsible for determining any question of copyright.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Please use the following format when citing materials from this collection:
Smith College Dept. of American Studies Records, Box #, Smith College Archives.

acqinfo.p: The American Studies Department records were created by the department and students in particular classes. The records were transfered to the College Archives over a period of time.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: These are unprocessed records/files and portions may be restricted. There are no box listings for these accessions.

did.unittitle: Newsletters, pamphlets, announcements, exams, newspaper articles, handbook 1970s-1990s
